name: Portrait of hope #020
description:
This portrait is one of the 540 that make up the "Mosaic of Hope".

540 black and white portraits of people wearing protective masks with messages of hope and wishes for the future.

540 portraits, brought together in a monumental open-air work: a large mosaic in the heart of Strasbourg....

Prints measuring 1m by 1m, glued to the ground with a distance of 1m between each portrait in order to symbolically respect the sanitary distance.

In this way, despite the imposed isolation, and following the example of social networks, we were able to collectively create a space for dialogue and shared hopes in the public space.

More information on the project: https://www.christophdebarry.fr/mosaique-de-lespoir/
